[ ](/new-location) [ ](/tickets-registration)

Slide 1 Slide 1 (current slide)

Slide 2 Slide 2 (current slide)

### Nestled in the heart of  
historic downtown Lewistown,

we’re a member-driven nonprofit organization dedicated to promoting and providing engaged access to art, education and cultural appreciation for Central Montana.

[ About Us ](/about)

_Lewistown Art Center Board of Directors:_

    Josephine Smith (Chair)

    Melissa Bell (Vice Chair)

Pam Avery (Secretary)

Mary Buchanan

Raha Sovereign

    Contact the Board at LewistownArtCenterBoard@gmail.com

**Bringing Arts and Education to Central Montana**

As we undergo our restructuring, our physical hours may be limited, but we’re excited to share that we continue to offer a variety of enriching programs:

  * After-school art classes in Lewistown and surrounding rural communities

  * Art crates filled with creative projects for students in rural and homeschooling environments

  * Engaging adult programming, including events and social nights

Thank you for your support as we work to enhance our programing!

[ Donate to Rebuilding Fund ](https://www.lewistownartcenter.net/tickets-registration/p/donation-for-consulting-and-rebuilding-fees)

[ Donate to Art Education ](https://www.lewistownartcenter.net/tickets-registration/p/donation-for-art-eductaion)

[ Donate to Ceramic Studio ](https://www.lewistownartcenter.net/tickets-registration/p/donation-for-the-ken-edwards-memorial-ceramic-studio)
